name: Petra Security
headline: Cybersecurity

founders.name: Cooper Edmunds, Founder
founders.description: Founder of Petra Security. Before Petra, I wrote software for a decade--spanning social, ride sharing, mobile games, and most recently trading systems at Bridgewater.

founders.name: Adithya Vellal, Founder
founders.description: CTO of Petra Security. I’ve been tackling machine learning problems in academia and industry for close to 7 years, and have published in numerous venues including ICML. Before Petra, I worked as a detection engineer at Abnormal Security, where I built ML systems to detect hacked email accounts that processed hundreds of millions of events a day.

generated_description:
**Petra Security: Securing the Future of Cybersecurity**

Founded in 2024 and based in San Francisco, Petra Security operates in the ever-evolving and critical field of cybersecurity. Initially launched as Stealth, the company quickly distinguished itself as part of Y Combinator’s Batch W24, signaling its innovative approach to an urgent problem: protecting Microsoft environments from cyber threats.

Petra Security consists of a lean team of three, driven by a mission to excel in cybersecurity. Their focus is sharp and essential—they specialize in detecting breaches of Microsoft accounts and thwarting attacks in real-time. With around-the-clock monitoring, Petra takes proactive steps to combat business email compromise (BEC) and token theft, which can cripple organizations and devastate data integrity.

### Why Petra Stands Out

Petra's technology leverages advanced machine learning and data science. Their adaptive fingerprinting technique transforms low-information logs into in-depth security insights—something like taking a handful of breadcrumbs and constructing a full meal. This allows them to spot stealthy attackers quickly, often within minutes of an intrusion. 

What sets Petra apart from competitors? Their best-in-class detection capabilities. They effectively monitor across Active Directory, Exchange, SharePoint, and Teams, capturing a full year of activity to uncover hidden threats that others might miss. Thanks to a seamless two-click integration and 60-second deployment, Petra's software can be up and running without disrupting a business’s daily operations. This means organizations can keep their employees engaged and working while ensuring their digital environment remains secure.

### The Promise of Efficiency

The company emphasizes speed and reliability in threat detection. They boast the fastest mean time to detect (MTTD) in the industry, ensuring that threats are neutralized before they can escalate. This performance is not just about rapid response; it’s also about the value they provide to corporate clients by ensuring business continuity during attacks.

Petra's commitment extends beyond mere detection. They provide thorough security assessments and detailed reporting tailored for executives and tech teams alike, allowing organizations to understand their security posture clearly. 

### Join the Cybersecurity Revolution

With a vision to turn the tide against cyber threats, Petra Security invites businesses to explore a free 30-day pilot of their services. It’s an opportunity to experience the robust protection they offer firsthand. 

In a digital world where threats are becoming more sophisticated, partnering with Petra means stepping into a safer future. Their unique combination of expert knowledge, adaptive technology, and commitment to excellence positions them as key players in the cybersecurity landscape—proving that even the smallest teams can make a big impact.

Explore more about Petra Security at [petrasecurity.com](https://petrasecurity.com).
